originalText.text: If I could rate 0 I would I paid 115 dollars to ship a box to maimon Dominican republic the box arrived empty the bottles of salt where emptied out on purpose along with the sugar of 75 cans of food I sent only 20 arrived this people are thieves stay away from this company horrible service I am going to take legal action against them because it's not fair they take my stuff that I paid for

originalText.text: I do not like the service at all, I have sent two boxes to DR and it already been almos 7 week that they haven’t deliver the boxes, they take too long for delivery, I have call and the lady on the phone stated that during holidays is very difficult and so on, what’s the Matter with holidays I sent the box en November not December and is almost January every day they have a new story. The lady hang up and that’s it so please don’t use this company they lack on everything…. No professionalism what so ever….

originalText.text: Do not use this company to send anything to another country. I recently sent a tank to DR and 75% of the iteams in my tank was stolen. I had over $2,000 worth of items in there. When I reported it to the company, it was as if no one was listening to me. Terrible customer service and this company should be shut down.

originalText.text: This is the worst shipping company! I sent a box to my family in DR and they hacked the box and stole most of the items in it... They took food, Clothing and toiletries. I made sacrifices to purchase those items and it is frustrating that they never got to my loved ones.  I have since heard this company is notorious for this kind of thing... DO NOT USE THEM!

originalText.text:
Sent an AC along with a mattress for a
reasonable price... although it took a month to arrive but that’s regular. First I received the mattress and then a week later they gave me the AC. They always answered my phone calls no matter how many times I called and annoyed them to know where and when were my things arriving.

I have no complaints. Everyone I spoke to were always willing to help. thank you for your service
